dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] breach of copyright]
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Thursday, July 14, 2005 5:01 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; wali@awakening.org
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] breach of copyright]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] breach of copyright
Date: Thu, 14 Jul 2005 08:39:54 +0100
From: Wali-ur Rahman <wali@awakening.org>
To: <abuse@servermatrix.com>

Hi,

One of your clients www.ankabut.com is hosting copyrighted materials on
their website.

http://www.ankabut.com/files/talks/hesham%20al-awadi/the%20four%20great%20im
ams/

If they do not remove this in the next 3 days, we will take legal action.

Hope to hear from you soon.

Thanks

Wali

- --
Thanks,
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFC1uCqvK/XpJs6oyURAgC/AJ9LAiI+m3/E6+v6uT+PWl4t22HqzwCff65s
1Wds42TBW2fqE78WT4zr3+c=
=nT7+
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
